name: @turboiam/agent-desktop
description: TurboIAM Agent — AI coding assistant desktop app for TurboIAM enterprise clients

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "SERVER,FRONTEND,ELECTRON" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:server && npm run build:electron
scripts.release: node -e "const v=require('./package.json').version; const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('git tag v'+v); execSync('git push origin v'+v); console.log('Tagged and pushed v'+v+' — GitHub Actions will now build the installers');"
